summary: This document is a formal request from a forensic accountant to UMB Bank for comprehensive financial records related to Ghislaine Maxwell and several associated entities. It demands all account documents, transaction records, identification, and correspondence from inception to present, indicating a deep financial investigation into Maxwell's network.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The primary individual for whom all financial records are being requested from UMB Bank. Her personal identifiers (DOB, SSN, addresses, email) are listed.

persons.name: Mark Lubin
persons.context: The individual making the records request, listed as the contact person for the bank.

connections.description: Mark Lubin, a forensic accountant, is formally requesting all financial records for Ghislaine Maxwell from UMB Bank.

locations: UMB Bank, NA 1010 Grand Blvd Kansas City, MO 64106
keyFacts: A forensic accountant named Mark Lubin is conducting a comprehensive financial investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell and her associated entities.
The investigation seeks all records from UMB Bank for Maxwell and the entities Terramar Project Inc., Ellmax LLC, Max Foundation, and Max Hotel Services Corp.

The request is extremely broad, covering every conceivable type of financial record, including transaction documents, identification, wire transfers, safe deposit records, and all electronic correspondence.
The request targets records from the inception of the accounts to the present, indicating a historical review of Maxwell's financial activities.
The document lists specific personal identifiers for Ghislaine Maxwell, including her date of birth (12/25/1961), addresses, and an email (GMAX1).
